channel.title: My skate footage
channel.description:
Over the summer my friends and I got together and got some footage of us skating. As we continued making them, I would make edits or montages of what we recorded. I got a total of 6 videos all together, and I just recently looked at them today for memories' sake. For all of you that skate, check this out. It's nothing serious, just summer fun.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vxHa0WhDFcs&feature=PlayList&p=FD3E3D3E59B5EBE4&index=0&playnext=1]Skazies Videos[/url]
Edit: To find me, I'm the one who says "I got my lemon ice tea in muh haaaaands" in the second video.
I'm also the one that says "Explosion!" in the third video.
Mind you, we all live in rural Indiana. Nothing like Cali or New York, so we're not amazing.

item.title: My skate footage
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:24, topic:321763”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=418192.msg3075311#msg3075311 date=1261787692]

Watching these videos I’m thinking to myself, wow, I wish I had a life.

Don’t worry.

Just kill your self and all the problems go away.

Or do it the “normal” way and get friends, but psshh who wouldn’t go for the first way!

Nah, I’m a really popular guy and all that, girlfriend and whatnot, play guitar and drums, ‘A’ grade student etc, but like, I don’t have any hobbies whatsoever. :o

Your hobby is modeling.

He also does porn.
[/quote]

I don’t even model that much anymore though, I might just like, spend an hour on a 3ds max model over 2 weeks, but literally that’s it.

And I do porn?
Nah, I don’t record it when I have sex, that would be… awkward.[/quote]

I always thought it would be kind of thrilling…I maybe wrong mind you.
Or if you don’t to recored it have someone recored it for you

Read full topic

Cool videos

I’m not a skateboarder, but I love longboarding. It’s a big part of my life

[/quote]Longboarding is fun as hell. I don’t longboard, but I tried it once. It’s really chill.[/quote]

Yeah it’s especially crazy if you live in a mountainous area, with huge hills. There’s hills where I was living in BC that are 13km long and you can reach speeds over 70mph

I think another was 21km or something. It’s basically going around mountains
